00140 inline void
00141 LandmarkLink::setLMName(const char* name)
00142 {
00143    mc2dbg8 << "updating m_lmName from \"" << m_lmName << "\" to \"" << name << "\"" << endl;
00144    delete m_lmName;
00145    m_lmName = StringUtility::newStrDup(name);
00146 }
00147 
00148 inline const char*
00149 LandmarkLink::getLMName() const
00150 {
00151    return m_lmName;
00152 }
00153 
00154 inline void
00155 LandmarkLink::setEndLM(bool endLM)
00156 {
00157    m_endLM = endLM;
00158 }
00159 
00160 inline bool
00161 LandmarkLink::isEndLM() const
00162 {
00163    return m_endLM;
00164 }
